What scientists just discovered about one of NZ’s most complex fault zones https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/what-scientists-just-discovered-about-one-of-nzs-most-complex-fault-zones/GWZTIAOTI5GVRARWUEXA4YL66I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/what-scientists-just-discovered-about-one-of-nzs-most-complex-fault-zones/GWZTIAOTI5GVRARWUEXA4YL66I/ Jamie MortonA groundbreaking NZ study has potential global implications for earthquake science. Pictured here near the Wairau River in Marlborough is the Awatere Fault, which cuts a clear line across the hills. Photo / GNS Science
